title: Difference between Al Rahman and Al Raheem | assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: tuba says what's the difference between these are two beautiful names of Allah some say that man is an a name that encompasses all creation so Allah azzawajal is to everyone and everything in this universe Believers and disbelievers while is specifically for the Believers and Allah was to the Believers merciful other Scholars like Ibrahim and and others say that man is an attribute of essence so this is describing Allah azzawajal himself while Rahim is an attribute and name related to his actions so Allah's actions he's described by AR Rahim while Allah in essence he's described by and Allah Knows Best
